## Model.stopAnimation() method

Stops playing an animation of the model

**Signature:**

```typescript
stopAnimation(name: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the animation to stop playing |

**Returns:**

void
